MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL18 and CH8 postcode area of Holywell and Rhyl, affecting properties in Ffordd Teilia, Lon Capel and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:19PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 02:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:28PM on 28th March 2021.
